metadata.name: VerityFair
metadata.description: Who is Verity Bourneville? She's a bit-part actress with a heart of gold and too many miles on the clock! Part "Eastenders", part "Model Agency" (and part "X-Files"), "Custard Creams" is her quest for a decent role--and respite from her nightmares. For "Sleaze Castle" and "Petra Etcetera" fans!
